definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
General Scholastic Ability Test (college entrance exam in Taiwan)
pinyin: Da4 xue2 Xue2 ke1 Neng2 li4 Ce4 yan4

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功與否取決於你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: Iclear own this do not have the ability robel.
sentences.chinese: 我自己清楚自己更本沒有能力逆天。

sentences.english: Appreciation of sculpture depends upon the ability to respond to form in three dimension.
sentences.chinese: 對雕塑的鑑賞力取決於對立體的反應能力。

sentences.english: Objectives To explore the training method of comprehensive competence for junior nurses in burn department.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燒傷科新護士綜合護理能力的培養方法。

sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界溝煤礦位於淮北煤田南部，設計生產能力爲0。

sentences.english: Not enough cooling power could mean heatstroke or dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻能力不足會造成中暑脫水。

sentences.english: Suso is such a gifted footballer and his technical ability is so good.
sentences.chinese: Suso的天賦無與倫比，技術能力超強。

sentences.english: Good ability for listening , speaking , reading and writing english.
sentences.chinese: 良好的英語聽說讀寫能力爲佳。

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，自我激勵，積極性和良好的分析能力，組織。

sentences.english: Leadership Don't get blinded by the cult-hero worshiped "Big L" leaders;
sentences.chinese: 領導能力無須盲目崇拜“大人物”領導者。

sentences.english: and they also have a greater capacity to address their emissions than developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 他們也比發展中國家更有能力解決排放能力。

sentences.english: and they also have a greater capacity to address their emissions than developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 他們也比發展中國家更有能力解決排放能力。

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生產手段齊全能量大，生產能力每月可達800噸。

sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力強，耐重茬，耐旱，適應廣。

sentences.english: But, can you recommend a competent friend.
sentences.chinese: 但，可以向你推薦一位有能力的朋友。

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要這個過程還在繼續，我就會盡量加大戰鬥能力。

definition: to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
